scn ArArrayizeString

;*Intended to receive strings that were generated by ArStringize

string_var svString

array_var aReturning
short iDelimPosition

begin _Function { svString }
; Open
let aReturning := ar_Construct "Array"
let iDelimPosition := 0
;
While (iDelimPosition:=sv_Find "," svString)!=-1
	ar_Append aReturning svString[0:iDelimPosition-1]
	sv_Erase svString 0 (iDelimPosition+1)
Loop
if eval (sv_Length svString) != -1
	ar_Append aReturning svString[0:(sv_Length svString)-1]
endif
SetFunctionValue aReturning
end
